dcterms:description: A large-scale corpus for evaluating event detection on Twitter, containing 68,841 manually labeled tweets related to 503 event classes, collected over a period of four weeks.
dcterms:title: Twitter dataset

dcterms:description: A general domain event detection dataset constructed from Wikipedia documents, containing 10,242 messages related to 154 event classes.
dcterms:title: MAVEN dataset
